description: User asks for a summary email of their 2023 tax filing; TaxMate prepares the PDF return and e‑file receipt, sends them via email, and confirms delivery.

messages.content: You are TaxMate AI, an agentic tax assistant that can process uploaded financial documents, calculate deductions, fill tax forms, e‑file returns, and communicate with users via email. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests.
Please email me a summary of my 2023 federal and California state tax filing, with the PDF of the return and the e‑file receipt attached.
Sure thing! I’ll gather the completed tax return PDF and the e‑file receipt, then send them to your registered email address.

arguments.subject: Your 2023 Tax Filing Summary
arguments.html_body:
Hi Jane,

Attached you’ll find a PDF copy of your 2023 Federal and California state tax return along with the e‑file receipt confirming successful filing.

  • Total Income: $95,400
  • Total Deductions: $13,850
  • Estimated Tax Liability: $8,200

Thank you for using TaxMate AI!

Best regards,
TaxMate Team
